Module com.example.main
Package com.example.main

Class ModifyAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
com.example.main.ModifyAppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyAppointmentController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the modify appointment page.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      When the Modify Appointment page is initialized this method will run. It fills columns of the table and other data to combo boxes and text fields. It will also translate any text to either French or English depending on system default.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • selectContact

      public void selectContact​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Uses the current contact selected to set the selectedContact variable.

    • saveButtonClick

      public void saveButtonClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      This method will save the appointment to the database. The method will go through a series of error checks to make sure that the appointment being added will cause no issues. If any check is failed the appointment will not be added and the user will get a message informing them why it failed to add.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.sql.SQLException

    • cancelButtonClick

      public void cancelButtonClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws java.io.IOException
      This method is assigned to a button and will take the user back to the main menu page.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • selectCustomer

      public int selectCustomer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws java.io.IOException
      This method is assigned to a button and will allow the user to select a customer to assign to an appointment.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
